name: places/ChIJMayrTYlYwokRLxH9BRny5h8
formattedAddress: 310 Riverside Dr Suite 200B, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 310 Riverside Dr Suite 200B, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: Moving in New York is pretty challenging... Especially is you're a summer candidate. Compound this with a (relatively) limited budget and being out of the country and you have my position. David not only helped me find an epic place but also made the move and transition easier than I have had in the past. Always quick to answer the phone or respond over email. I did have to pay a fee, but we worked together on it and if you can amortize it out over your lease it becomes far more reasonable. I really do believe you get a better place with a cheaper monthly rent if you bite the bullet and pay the fee. Plus if you work with Blackwater 20% goes to a good cause. When I moved in, there were a few things I wanted fixed in the place and David was on the phone with the landlord right away to get it sorted. Overall, great experience.

originalText.text:
5/5 Stars

Outstanding leasing experience! Blackwater's team made the process smooth and stress-free. Their expertise and customer care are unmatched. Highly recommend for anyone seeking reliable and professional leasing services.

originalText.text: This company is quick to collect your deposit and show you the apartment. However, they do not respond to any questions or follow up on the status of application. The owner, David is rude and has no customer service skills.

originalText.text: The fees are reasonable and were thoroughly explained to me. The staff are highly commendable and knowledgeable about the apartments. They do their bests. Renting an apartment at the heart of Manhattan had never been this easy.

text.text: The fees are reasonable and were thoroughly explained to me. The staff are highly commendable and knowledgeable about the apartments. They do their bests. Renting an apartment at the heart of Manhattan had never been this easy.

originalText.text: I just got into the city and my friend recommended this company, though there are the fees but I'm so glad that they walked me through it and followed up on me from time to time.
